comment: A variable introduction law for equality. Lemma 15 of [Monk2] p. 109, however we do not require ` z ` to be distinct from ` x ` and ` y ` . See ~ equvinv for a shorter proof requiring fewer axioms when ` z ` is required to be distinct from ` x ` and ` y ` . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 15-Sep-2018.)
